column2:
"It's obvious what Zeno's going to end up
doing--he'll be trying to save everyone he
runs into, even berserk dragorii."

"So when that happens, I want to be able
to help at least a little bit. Or I don't want
to get in his way, at least."

"Wh-What? Why are you looking at me like
that? Well, come on, already. Let's go!"

"ゼノの考えることはお見通し！
凶暴化した龍族だって助けようと
するに決まってる！"

"だからあたしは、そうなった時のために
せめてゼノの足を引っ張らないように
なっておきたいの。"

"……な、何よその目は！
さっさと行くわよ！　ほら！"
